title: Niagara Grocery
description: A community grocer carrying all sorts of fresh, local, and organic veggies and fruit along with a personable vibe. Many gluten free as well as vegan items, including: Salt Spring smoked tofu, vegan Daiya cheese, tempeh, Yves fakin' bacon. You can also get fresh roasted fair trade organic coffee (roasted in a Sono Fresco air roaster in-house), a choco-peppermint soy latte, tea, and fruit smoothie. Their sister market is Fairfield market.
